name: Revival
description:
Revival is a 2D Puzzle platformer in which you take control of a girl who has the ability to control the elements of the seasons: spring, summer, autumn, and winter. You must use these abilities in order to traverse the levels and restore the seasons upon the Earth.

Members - 

Ervie Tubig - Lead Programmer

Suzanna Chen - Artist

Santiago - Game Designer

Ken Liu - Programmer

Cassie Wang - Programmer
